articles.title: JAYU: Gemini Computer Use Agent
articles.subtitle: A vision-language agent capable of controlling desktop environments to perform complex, multi-step tasks with human-level reliability.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: JAYU Agent identifying UI elements and executing a complex booking task.

articles.title: SABRE: Shared Autonomy for Battlefield Response
articles.subtitle: An autonomous drone coordination system for battlefield awareness and tactical response.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: SABRE drone swarm coordination system.

articles.title: LEVIATHAN: AI Co-Pilot for Smart Fishing
articles.subtitle: Bringing big insights no matter the crew size. Your AI co-pilot for commercial and recreational fishing.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: LEVIATHAN marine analytics dashboard.

articles.title: Bruin Bite: UCLA Dining Companion
articles.subtitle: Find and review the best dining halls and food spots on UCLA campus with a clean, student-first UI.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Student-first views of UCLA dining halls and menus.

articles.title: Sir Syncs A Lot: Phone-to-Desktop Control
articles.subtitle: Control your computer from your phone as an extension of a computer-use agent.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Remote control surface driving desktop input.

articles.title: Berry Tongue: AI Language Companion
articles.subtitle: AI-powered language learning Chrome extension that surfaces vocabulary in context.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: In-page overlays highlighting vocabulary.

articles.title: UCLA Course Planner
articles.subtitle: Plan your UCLA courses with ease using this intuitive web app.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Course planning dashboard.

articles.title: Project Oliver
articles.subtitle: RAG Chatbot to answer questions by citing UCLA Daily Bruin Newspaper articles.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Oliver bot with document citations.

articles.title: Persistence
articles.subtitle: AI powered to do list, task manager, and reminder web/mobile app.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Productivity assistant UI.

articles.title: Project Montgomery
articles.subtitle: Math and physics animation generator for students and educators.
articles.heroCaption: Figure: Generated animation preview.

articles.title: MOIRAI: Live Collaborative Vibe Coding
articles.subtitle: A WIP collaboration layer that turns group brainstorming into live AI-implemented code.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: MOIRAI envisions a shared, live coding space where ideas materialize in real time.

articles.title: Transformer Based Robot Policy
articles.subtitle: Action Chunking Transformers for bimanual manipulation policies on a custom ALOHA setup.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Action Chunking Transformer policies evaluated on bimanual manipulation tasks.

articles.title: Diffusion Based Robot Policy
articles.subtitle: Exploring diffusion policies for smooth, coordinated bimanual manipulation on ALOHA.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Diffusion policy rollout on bimanual manipulation trajectories.

articles.title: Qwen LLM Fine Tuning
articles.subtitle: LoRA and PEFT adaptation of Qwen models on an eBay car dataset for structured domain responses.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Domain-specific fine-tuning for automotive listing understanding.

articles.title: Pose Estimation for Automated Swimmer Technique Feedback
articles.subtitle: Real-time swimmer action recognition using pose estimation to deliver technique feedback.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Pose-driven technique feedback for swimmer performance analysis.

articles.title: Gaze Conditioned Robotic Bimanual Manipulation Policy
articles.subtitle: Fusing Action Chunking Transformers with gaze and vision-language signals for coordinated bimanual control.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Bimanual manipulation policy conditioned on gaze and visual context.

articles.title: Shared Autonomy for Teaching Parallel Parking in Driving Sim
articles.subtitle: ZPD-based shared autonomy with a two-phase NMPC expert in CARLA for robust parallel parking.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Shared autonomy training and evaluation in CARLA.

articles.title: GAMMA: Gaze Based VLM Control for Single Arm Manipulation
articles.subtitle: Gaze-assisted manipulation with foundation models for intent prediction and modular autonomy.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: GAMMA concept for gaze-assisted manipulation with VLM grounding.

articles.title: Enhancing Pose Estimation on Swimmers
articles.subtitle: Optimizing underwater pose estimation and swimmer action recognition for real-time feedback.
articles.heroCaption: Figure 1: Pose estimation for underwater swimmer analysis.

articles.title: Exercise Recognition with Pose Estimation on Edge Devices
articles.subtitle: Benchmarking CNN pipelines across GPUs and FPGAs for pose-based action recognition.
